resources.string:
This is a normal game of "Hangman" where you get 6 wrong guesses before you loose(head, body, arm, arm, leg, leg). 
 In case you do not know the rules of Hangman they are as follows: 
 	 You are presented with a number of underscores each representing a letter that combined make a word or phrase. 
 	 Your job is to guess the word or phrase by guessing letters that it might contain, and in this version you can only make 6 wrong guesses before you loose.
Play the game to make some stats.
